Package com.hedera.sdk.account

Class HederaAccount

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hedera.sdk.account.HederaAccount
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class HederaAccount
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class to manage a cryptocurrency account
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      HederaKeyPair accountKey
      The HederaKeyPair for the account the key that must sign each transfer out of the account.
      long accountNum
      The account number for the account
      HederaDuration autoRenewPeriod
      the account is charged to extend its expiration date every this many seconds.
      java.util.List<HederaClaim> claims
      the list of claims attached to this account as a result of a query
      HederaTimeStamp expirationTime
      The expiration time of the account as a result of a query
      HederaTransactionID hederaTransactionID
      The HederaTransactionID for a transaction in relation to this account
      long initialBalance
      The initial balance when creating a new account
      int maxReceiveProxyFraction
      when another account tries to proxy stake to this account, accept it only if the proxyFraction from that other account is at most maxReceiveProxyFraction
      HederaKeyPair newAccountKey
      The new HederaKeyPair for the account the key that must sign each transfer out of the account.
      HederaKeyPair newRealmAdminKey
      The new realm administration key HederaKeyPair for the account note: if a newRealmAdminKeySig is specified, this will be ignored
      HederaAccountID proxyAccountID
      the HederaAccountID to proxy tokens to If proxyAccountID is null, or is an invalid account, or is an account that isn't a node, then this account is automatically proxy staked to a node chosen by the network, but without earning payments.
      int proxyFraction
      payments earned from proxy staking are shared between the node and this account, with proxyFraction / 10000 going to this account
      long realmNum
      The realm number for the account
      long receiveRecordThreshold
      create an account record for any transaction depositing more than this many tinybars
      boolean receiverSigRequired
      if true, this account's key must sign any transaction depositing into this account (in addition to all withdrawals).
      long sendRecordThreshold
      create an account record for any transaction withdrawing more than this many tinybars
      long shardNum
      The shard number for the account
      HederaTransactionAndQueryDefaults txQueryDefaults
      Default parameters for a transaction or query

      long getBalance()
      Gets the balance of the account, returns -1 if an error occurred in the event of an error, check the value of this.precheckResult to determine the cause of the error Note: You may perform a "getBalanceCostAnswer" in order to ascertain the cost of the query first The cost could be cached and refreshed from time to time, there is no need to look it up before each getBalance query
      long getBalance​(long shardNum, long realmNum, long accountNum)
      Gets the balance of the account, returns -1 if an error occurred in the event of an error, check the value of this.precheckResult to determine the cause of the error Note: You may perform a "getBalanceCostAnswer" in order to ascertain the cost of the query first The cost could be cached and refreshed from time to time, there is no need to look it up before each getBalance query
      boolean getBalance​(HederaTransaction payment, HederaQueryHeader.QueryResponseType responseType)
      Runs a query to get the account balance of the given account If successful, the method populates the balance property of the account, cost and state proof if requested
      boolean getBalanceAnswerOnly​(HederaTransaction payment)
      Gets the balance of the account, requesting only an answer If successful, the method populates the balance property of the account and cost
      boolean getBalanceAnswerStateProof()
      Gets the cost of enquiring for balance of the account, requesting a state proof If successful, the method populates the cost property
      boolean getBalanceCostAnswer()
      Gets the cost of enquiring for balance of the account, requesting only an answer If successful, the method populates the cost property
      boolean getBalanceStateProof​(HederaTransaction payment)
      Gets the balance of the account, requesting only an answer If successful, the method populates the balance property of the account, cost and stateproof
      long getCost()
      Returns the cost of a query after it's been requested

      boolean getInfo()
      Get info for the account which is specified by the shardNum, realmNum and accountNum properties of this class in the event of an error, check the value of this.precheckResult to determine the cause of the error Note: You may perform a "getInfoCostAnswer" in order to ascertain the cost of the query first The cost could be cached and refreshed from time to time, there is no need to look it up before each getInfo query
      boolean getInfo​(long shardNum, long realmNum, long accountNum)
      Get info for the account in the event of an error, check the value of this.precheckResult to determine the cause of the error Note: You may perform a "getInfoCostAnswer" in order to ascertain the cost of the query first The cost could be cached and refreshed from time to time, there is no need to look it up before each getInfo query
      boolean getInfo​(HederaTransaction payment, HederaQueryHeader.QueryResponseType responseType)
      Runs a query to get information for a given account If successful, the method populates the properties this object depending on the type of answer requested
      boolean getInfoAnswerOnly​(HederaTransaction payment)
      Runs a query to get information for a given account, requesting only an answer If successful, the method populates the properties this object
      boolean getInfoCostAnswer()
      Runs a query to get the cost of getting information for a given account without a state proof If successful, the method populates the cost property of this object
      boolean getInfoCostAnswerStateProof()
      Runs a query to get the cost of getting information for a given account with a state proof If successful, the method populates the cost property of this object
      boolean getInfoStateProof​(HederaTransaction payment)
      Runs a query to get information for a given account, requesting a stateproof If successful, the method populates the properties this object including a state proof

      Get records attached to this account Note: If no records are found, the function returns an empty array if however an error occurred, it will return null

      Get records attached to this account Note: If no records are found, the function returns an empty array if however an error occurred, it will return null

      Runs a query to get records attached to an account without a state proof If successful, the method sets the records property and cost
      boolean getRecordsAnswerStateProof()
      Runs a query to find out the cost of getting records attached to an account with a state proof If successful, the method sets the cost
      boolean getRecordsCostAnswer()
      Runs a query to find out the cost of getting records attached to an account without a state proof If successful, the method sets the cost
      boolean getRecordsStateProof​(HederaTransaction payment)
      Runs a query to get records attached to an account with a state proof If successful, the method sets the records property, cost and state proof

      Send an amount of crypto currency to an account The paying account is the same as the one paying for the transaction

      This method runs a transaction to transfer cryptocurrency between accounts
      HederaTransactionResult update​(long shardNum, long realmNum, long accountNum, HederaAccountUpdateValues updates)
      Updates an account in the simplest possible way Make sure the supplied HederaAccountUpdateValues (updates) contains all the necessary updates It is also recommended you create a new account object prior to running this call to ensure properties from an older instance are used to update this account's properties
      HederaTransactionResult update​(HederaAccountUpdateValues updates)
      Updates an account in the simplest possible way Make sure the supplied HederaAccountUpdateValues (updates) contains all the necessary updates It is also recommended you create a new account object prior to running this call to ensure properties from an older instance are used to update this account's properties
      HederaTransactionResult update​(HederaTransactionID transactionID, HederaAccountID nodeAccount, long transactionFee, HederaDuration transactionValidDuration, boolean generateRecord, java.lang.String memo, HederaSignatureList sigsForTransaction)
      This method runs a transaction to update an account

    • Field Detail

      • txQueryDefaults

        public HederaTransactionAndQueryDefaults txQueryDefaults
        Default parameters for a transaction or query

      • shardNum

        public long shardNum
        The shard number for the account

      • realmNum

        public long realmNum
        The realm number for the account

      • accountNum

        public long accountNum
        The account number for the account

      • hederaTransactionID

        public HederaTransactionID hederaTransactionID
        The HederaTransactionID for a transaction in relation to this account

      • newRealmAdminKey

        public HederaKeyPair newRealmAdminKey
        The new realm administration key HederaKeyPair for the account note: if a newRealmAdminKeySig is specified, this will be ignored

      • accountKey

        public HederaKeyPair accountKey
        The HederaKeyPair for the account the key that must sign each transfer out of the account. If receiverSigRequired is true, then it must also sign any transfer into the account.

      • newAccountKey

        public HederaKeyPair newAccountKey
        The new HederaKeyPair for the account the key that must sign each transfer out of the account. If receiverSigRequired is true, then it must also sign any transfer into the account.

      • initialBalance

        public long initialBalance
        The initial balance when creating a new account

      • proxyAccountID

        public HederaAccountID proxyAccountID
        the HederaAccountID to proxy tokens to If proxyAccountID is null, or is an invalid account, or is an account that isn't a node, then this account is automatically proxy staked to a node chosen by the network, but without earning payments. If the proxyAccountID account refuses to accept proxy staking at the given fraction, or if it is not currently running a node, then it will behave as if both proxyAccountID and proxyFraction were null.

      • proxyFraction

        public int proxyFraction
        payments earned from proxy staking are shared between the node and this account, with proxyFraction / 10000 going to this account

      • maxReceiveProxyFraction

        public int maxReceiveProxyFraction
        when another account tries to proxy stake to this account, accept it only if the proxyFraction from that other account is at most maxReceiveProxyFraction

      • sendRecordThreshold

        public long sendRecordThreshold
        create an account record for any transaction withdrawing more than this many tinybars

      • receiveRecordThreshold

        public long receiveRecordThreshold
        create an account record for any transaction depositing more than this many tinybars

      • receiverSigRequired

        public boolean receiverSigRequired
        if true, this account's key must sign any transaction depositing into this account (in addition to all withdrawals). This field is immutable; it cannot be changed by a CryptoUpdate transaction.

      • autoRenewPeriod

        public HederaDuration autoRenewPeriod
        the account is charged to extend its expiration date every this many seconds. If it doesn't have enough, it extends as long as possible. If it is empty when it expires, then it is deleted. Defaults to 60 * 60 * 24 * 30 = 30 days (60s * 60m * 24h * 30d)

      • claims

        public java.util.List<HederaClaim> claims
        the list of claims attached to this account as a result of a query

      • expirationTime

        public HederaTimeStamp expirationTime
        The expiration time of the account as a result of a query

      • bodyToSignForCreate

        public com.hederahashgraph.api.proto.java.TransactionBody bodyToSignForCreate​(HederaTransactionID transactionID,
                                                                              HederaAccountID nodeAccount,
                                                                              long transactionFee,
                                                                              HederaDuration transactionValidDuration,
                                                                              boolean generateRecord,
                                                                              java.lang.String memo)
        This method returns the body of a transaction to create an account so that it can be signed
        Parameters:
        transactionID - the HederaTransactionID for the transaction
        nodeAccount - the HederaAccountID of the account of the node to which the transaction is submitted
        transactionFee - the fee paid by the client to run the transaction
        transactionValidDuration - the duration of the transaction's validity as HederaDuration
        generateRecord - boolean to indicate if a record should be generated as a result of this transaction
        memo - String memo to include in the transaction
        Returns:
        TransactionBody

      • bodyToSignForTransfer

        public com.hederahashgraph.api.proto.java.TransactionBody bodyToSignForTransfer​(HederaTransactionID transactionID,
                                                                                HederaAccountID nodeAccount,

                                                                                boolean generateRecord,
                                                                                java.lang.String memo,
                                                                                java.util.ArrayList<HederaAccountAmount> accountAmounts)
        This method returns the body of a transaction to transfer cryptocurrency between accounts so that it can be signed
        Parameters:
        transactionID - the HederaTransactionID for the transaction
        nodeAccount - the HederaAccountID of the account of the node to which the transaction is submitted
        transactionFee - the fee paid by the client to run the transaction
        transactionValidDuration - the duration of the transaction's validity as HederaDuration
        generateRecord - boolean to indicate if a record should be generated as a result of this transaction
        memo - String memo to include in the transaction
        accountAmounts - hte list of accounts and amounts to transfer
        Returns:
        TransactionBody

      • create

        public HederaTransactionResult create​(HederaTransactionID transactionID,
                                      HederaAccountID nodeAccount,
                                      long transactionFee,
                                      HederaDuration transactionValidDuration,
                                      boolean generateRecord,
                                      java.lang.String memo,
                                      HederaSignatureList sigsForTransaction)
                               throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        This method runs a transaction to create an account
        Parameters:
        transactionID - the HederaTransactionID for the transaction
        nodeAccount - the HederaAccountID of the account of the node to which the transaction is submitted
        transactionFee - the fee paid by the client to run the transaction
        transactionValidDuration - the duration of the transaction's validity as HederaDuration
        generateRecord - boolean to indicate if a record should be generated as a result of this transaction
        memo - String memo to include in the transaction
        sigsForTransaction - The signatures for the transaction as a HederaSignatureList
        Returns:
        HederaTransactionResult
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - in the event that communication to the node resulted in an error

      • transfer

        public HederaTransactionResult transfer​(HederaTransactionID transactionID,
                                        HederaAccountID nodeAccount,
                                        long transactionFee,
                                        HederaDuration transactionValidDuration,
                                        boolean generateRecord,
                                        java.lang.String memo,
                                        HederaSignatureList sigsForTransaction,
                                        java.util.ArrayList<HederaAccountAmount> accountAmounts)
                                 throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        This method runs a transaction to transfer cryptocurrency between accounts
        Parameters:
        transactionID - the HederaTransactionID for the transaction
        nodeAccount - the HederaAccountID of the account of the node to which the transaction is submitted
        transactionFee - the fee paid by the client to run the transaction
        transactionValidDuration - the duration of the transaction's validity as HederaDuration
        generateRecord - boolean to indicate if a record should be generated as a result of this transaction
        memo - String memo to include in the transaction
        sigsForTransaction - The signatures for the transaction as a HederaSignatureList
        accountAmounts - the accounts and amounts to transfer currency to and from
        Returns:
        HederaTransactionResult
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - in the event that communication to the node resulted in an error

                   throws java.lang.InterruptedException

        Boolean indicating success or failure of the query

        java.lang.InterruptedException - should an exception occur during communication with the node

                                      long realmNum,
                                      java.lang.String publicKey,
                                      HederaKeyPair.KeyType keyType,
                                      long initialBalance,
                                      HederaAccountCreateDefaults defaults)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates an account in the simplest possible way
        Parameters:
        shardNum - the shard number for the new account
        realmNum - the realm number for the new account
        publicKey - the public key for the new account
        keyType - the type of the account's public key

        defaults - the defaults for the account creation (can be null)

      • getBalance

        public long getBalance()
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Gets the balance of the account, returns -1 if an error occurred in the event of an error, check the value of this.precheckResult to determine the cause of the error Note: You may perform a "getBalanceCostAnswer" in order to ascertain the cost of the query first The cost could be cached and refreshed from time to time, there is no need to look it up before each getBalance query
        Returns:
        Long
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - in the event of an error

      • update

        public HederaTransactionResult update​(HederaAccountUpdateValues updates)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Updates an account in the simplest possible way Make sure the supplied HederaAccountUpdateValues (updates) contains all the necessary updates It is also recommended you create a new account object prior to running this call to ensure properties from an older instance are used to update this account's properties
        Parameters:
        updates - the updates to apply to the account
        Returns:
        HederaTransactionResult
